N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 575.18 - Designation of agents

State Regulations

Tax Law, ยง 1407

The recording officers in New York State are hereby
designated and shall act as the agents of the commissioner to collect the real
estate transfer tax. All such agents shall collect the tax and show payment in
the manner authorized by the department. The department shall notify each such
agent in writing of the method for collecting the tax, noting payment of the
tax, and paying it over to the department. Notes
